document_data.name: Kinopal
document_data.mainbody: '''Kinopal''' was an [[Azuposi]] settlement in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]]. It was home to about 800 people, but had a dark reputation, for rumors said that past leaders of Kinopal had made a pact with evil forces for personal gain, but with dire consequences for their descendants.<ref>
